description:
Looks like one of the links in http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/how_to_get_involved.html#how-to-do-great-nova-spec-reviews needs to be updated.

That, or, some redirect is happening so that you can't ever get to a /devref/ listing. The link is http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/devref/kilo.blueprints.html#when-is-a-blueprint-needed.
title: Broken link to nova/devref in http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/how_to_get_involved.html#how-to-do-great-nova-spec-reviews

comments.content:
Looks like one of the links in http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/how_to_get_involved.html#how-to-do-great-nova-spec-reviews needs to be updated.

That, or, some redirect is happening so that you can't ever get to a /devref/ listing. The link is http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/devref/kilo.blueprints.html#when-is-a-blueprint-needed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle
